Posts.Content: Hi I was diagnosed with very early breast cancer in Sept 16, I opted for mastectomy although Dr said a lumpectomy was usual, I had no radiotherapy or chemo, all seemed well, started Tamoxifen in November, in early Feb i began to get pelvic cramps,wind,constipation/ibs but not constant, it seems i have 3 weeks ok and one week of pain, i am having a scan next week, has anyone had similarÂ
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen Side Effects
